heading: HB07986
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING AN EDUCATION COMMITTEE IN EVERY BARANGAY IN THE COUNTRY TO ENSURE THAT ALL SCHOOL AGE CHILDREN ENTER THE SCHOOL SYSTEM AT KINDERGARTEN AGE AND SENIOR HIGH SCHOOL UPON COMPLETION OF GRADE 10 AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
